name: Nakajima Satoru Kanshuu: F-1 Hero '94
overview: Nakajima Satoru F-1 Hero '94 is a Super Famicom Formula One driving game endorsed by Satoru Nakajima. Presently, it is the last game to carry his endorsement. The game was also sponsored by FOCA and Fuji TV: the former license allowed them to use team/driver names, while the latter is the TV station that held the rights to show Formula One on Japanese television. The game, like the previous Nakajima Satoru Super F-1 Hero, uses Mode 7 for its races. The game also features drivers and teams from the 1994 F1 season that the player can choose for their vehicle, and a number of customization options.
